Stat.Name: vpip
Stat.Description: Poker Tracker VP$IP for chair x
Stat.Query: SELECT (case when (count(*)!=0) then cast(sum(case when flg_vpip then 1 else 0 end) as real) / count(*) else (-1) end) as result FROM player as P, holdem_hand_player_statistics as S WHERE S.id_player = P.id_player AND P.player_name like '%SCREENNAME%' AND P.id_site=%SITEID%
